animes.title: Attack on Titan
animes.description: In a world where humanity resides within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans, young Eren Yeager joins the military to fight back.

animes.title: My Hero Academia
animes.description: In a world where nearly every human has superpowers, a powerless boy dreams of becoming a hero.

animes.title: Demon Slayer
animes.description: After his family is slaughtered by demons, Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge them and save his sister.

animes.title: One Piece
animes.description: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew search for the legendary One Piece treasure to become the next Pirate King.

animes.title: Naruto
animes.description: A young ninja with dreams of becoming the strongest leader in his village struggles with the demon fox spirit sealed within him.

animes.title: Death Note
animes.description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name.

animes.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
animes.description: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment.

animes.title: Sword Art Online
animes.description: Players are trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG, and they must clear the game to escape.

animes.title: Your Name
animes.description: Two teenagers from different parts of Japan find themselves inexplicably linked through their dreams.
